...间下鱵（学名：Hyporhamphus intermedius，Asian pencil halfbeak）为鱵科下鱵鱼属的鱼类。分布于印度洋北部沿岸、东到日本、南至新西兰以及渤海、黄海、东海、南海等水域及其附近江河和内河等海域，属于暖水性近海鱼类。其常生活于中上层水域以及亦生活于河口附近和进入淡水。该物种的模式产地在舟山群岛。<ref name='id67.

means.word_mean: 1. tropical and subtropical marine and freshwater fishes having an elongated body and long protruding lower jaw

auth_sentence.content: The elongated lower jaw is lost in adults and is lost in most juveniles in the flyingfishes and some halfbeak genera.
